author: Kevin Goddard
title: Drake Posts Rare Picture With Sade
text:
Home > Music > Drake Posts Rare Picture With Sade Drake Posts Rare Picture With Sade 37 9 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Mar 20, 2017 at 10:48pm Drake shows love to his mother & Sade! Two of the most important women in Drake ‚Äôs life were by his side Monday to celebrate the success of his newly-released album More Life ... his mother & iconic singer/songwriter Sade ! Taking to Instagram Monday night, the 6 God posted a very rare picture with his mother & Sade in each one of his arms, leaving the caption: "Two very important ladies in my life. üå∫‚Äù along with the More Life flower emoji. Of course, Twitter is going nuts considering how rare it is to see Sade in a recent photo. Knowing Drake's profound appreciation for Sade over the years, fellow YMCMB singer Nicki Minaj decided to jump in his comments & leave a little heartfelt message for the 6 God. ‚ÄúI know you‚Äôre getting this framed. I know how much Sade means to u. Look @u in the pic w/ her AND mummy. Yikes. Congratulations Brown Bwoy," Nicki commented (see below). Check out the very rare & heartfelt picture (below). A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Mar 20, 2017 at 7:00pm PDT < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Mar 20, 2017 at 10:48pm 9.8K Views
